ygData.subject: Re: Chains and slowdown
ygData.msgSnippet: I tested on a large rat.  It was 39 seconds--therefore still 30% slowdown at level 37.  When I get level 38 I ll test again. Thex Luteslinger(Tunare) 37th
ygData.messageBody:
I tested on a large rat. It was 39 seconds--therefore
still 30% slowdown at level 37. When I get level 38
I'll test again.

Thex Luteslinger(Tunare)
37th level bard

**************************
Sounds like you win a cookie. :)
Since you're L37, why don't you test Chain's
slowdownfor us
at L38 and L39? Just got to a newbie area, find
anarea away
from other combat spam, repeatedly Chain a mob,
andtime how
long it takes for it to attack you 10 times (theattack
when
you start your stopwatch is #0, not #1). If it's
39seconds,
then it's the 30% I observed between L23 and L35.
Ifit's
42-43 sec, then you're getting the 40% I'm getting
atL48.--John H. Kim
kim@...
